016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.server;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.InstanceConfiguration;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
022import jakarta.inject.Inject;
023import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
024import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
025import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PreDestroy;
026import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
027import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
028import org.xbill.DNS.Record;
029import org.xbill.DNS.*;
030
031import java.io.IOException;
032import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
033import java.net.DatagramPacket;
034import java.net.DatagramSocket;
035import java.net.SocketException;
036import java.nio.channels.AsynchronousCloseException;
037import java.util.HashMap;
038import java.util.List;
039import java.util.Map;
040import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
041import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
042import java.util.concurrent.Executors;
043
044import static org.xbill.DNS.Message.MAXLENGTH;
045import static org.xbill.DNS.Record.fromString;
046
047@Service(name = "dns.server")
048public class DnsServerService {
049    private final Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(getClass());
050
051    static final int FLAG_DNSSECOK = 1;
052    static final int FLAG_SIGONLY = 2;
053
054    private Configuration configuration;
055
056    private final Map<String, TSIG> TSIGs = new HashMap<>();
057    private final Map<Name, TSIG> zoneTSIGs = new HashMap<>();
058    private final Map<Name, Zone> znames = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
059    private final Map<Integer, Cache> caches = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
060
061    @Inject
062    public DnsServerService(Configuration configuration) throws IOException {
063        this.configuration = configuration;
064        InstanceConfiguration standardConfiguration = new InstanceConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("instance"));
065        DnsServerConfiguration dnsServerConfiguration = new DnsServerConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("dns.server"));
066
067        // Create keys
068        dnsServerConfiguration.getKeys().ifPresent(list -> list.forEach(kc ->
069        {
070            TSIGs.put(kc.getName(), new TSIG(kc.getAlgorithm(), kc.getName(), kc.getSecret()));
071        }));
072
073        // Create Zones
074        dnsServerConfiguration.getZones().ifPresent(list -> list.forEach(zc ->
075        {
076            try {
077                Name origin = Name.fromString(zc.getName(), Name.root);
078                Name nameServer = Name.fromString("ns1", origin);
079                Zone zone = new Zone(origin, new Record[]{new SOARecord(
080                        origin,
081                        DClass.IN,
082                        60,
083                        nameServer,
084                        nameServer,
085                        1, 600, 600, 600, 86400),
086                        new NSRecord(origin, DClass.IN, 600, Name.fromString(standardConfiguration.getIp().getHostAddress(), Name.root))});
087                znames.put(zone.getOrigin(), zone);
088
089            } catch (IOException e) {
090                throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
091            }
092        }));
093
094        logger.info("Started DNS server");
095    }
096
097    public void handle(Message request, Message response)
098            throws IOException {
099        Header header = request.getHeader();
100
101        if (header.getRcode() != Rcode.NOERROR) {
102            errorMessage(request.getHeader(), response, Rcode.FORMERR, request.getQuestion());
103            return;
104        }
105
106        switch (header.getOpcode()) {
107            case Opcode.QUERY -> queryRequest(request, response);
108            case Opcode.UPDATE -> updateRequest(request, response);
109            default -> errorMessage(request.getHeader(), response, Rcode.NOTIMP, request.getQuestion());
110        }
111    }
112
113    private void queryRequest(Message request, Message response) {
114        Header header = request.getHeader();
115        int flags = 0;
116
117        if (header.getOpcode() != Opcode.QUERY) {
118            errorMessage(request.getHeader(), response, Rcode.NOTIMP, request.getQuestion());
119            return;
120        }
121
122        Record question = request.getQuestion();
123
124        response.getHeader().setFlag(Flags.QR);
125        if (header.getFlag(Flags.RD)) {
126            response.getHeader().setFlag(Flags.RD);
127        }
128
129/* NYI
130        TSIGRecord queryTSIG = request.getTSIG();
131        TSIG tsig = null;
132        if (queryTSIG != null) {
133            tsig = TSIGs.get(queryTSIG.getName());
134            if (tsig == null || tsig.verify(query, in, null) != Rcode.NOERROR) {
135                return formerrMessage(in);
136            }
137        }
138*/
139
140        if (!Type.isRR(question.getType()) && question.getType() != Type.ANY) {
141            errorMessage(header, response, Rcode.NOTIMP, question);
142            return;
143        }
144
145        int rcode = addAnswer(response, question.getName(), question.getType(), question.getDClass(), 0, 0);
146
147        if (rcode != Rcode.NOERROR && rcode != Rcode.NXDOMAIN) {
148            errorMessage(header, response, rcode, question);
149            return;
150        }
151
152        addAdditional(response, flags);
153
154    }
155
156    private void updateRequest(Message request, Message response) {
157
158        // TODO Signature check
159
160        Name zoneName = request.getQuestion().getName();
161        Zone zone = znames.get(zoneName);
162        if (zone == null) {
163            errorMessage(request.getHeader(), response, Rcode.NXDOMAIN, request.getQuestion());
164            return;
165        }
166
167        for (Record record : request.getSection(Section.UPDATE)) {
168            if (record.getDClass() == DClass.NONE) {
169                Record originalRecord = Record.newRecord(record.getName(), record.getType(), DClass.IN, 0, record.rdataToWireCanonical());
170                zone.removeRecord(originalRecord);
171            } else {
172                zone.addRecord(record);
173            }
174        }
175    }
176
177    private int addAnswer(Message response, Name name, int type, int dClass, int iterations, int flags) {
178        SetResponse sr;
179        int rcode = Rcode.NOERROR;
180
181        if (iterations > 6) {
182            return Rcode.NOERROR;
183        }
184
185        if (type == Type.SIG || type == Type.RRSIG) {
186            type = Type.ANY;
187            flags |= FLAG_SIGONLY;
188        }
189
190        Zone zone = findBestZone(name);
191        if (zone != null) {
192            sr = zone.findRecords(name, type);
193        } else {
194            Cache cache = getCache(dClass);
195            sr = cache.lookupRecords(name, type, Credibility.NORMAL);
196        }
197
198/*
199        if (sr.isUnknown()) {
200            addCacheNS(response, getCache(dClass), name);
201        }
202*/
203        if (sr.isUnknown() || sr.isNXDOMAIN()) {
204            response.getHeader().setRcode(Rcode.NXDOMAIN);
205            if (zone != null) {
206                addSOA(response, zone);
207                if (iterations == 0) {
208                    response.getHeader().setFlag(Flags.AA);
209                }
210            }
211            rcode = Rcode.NXDOMAIN;
212        } else if (sr.isNXRRSET()) {
213            if (zone != null) {
214                addSOA(response, zone);
215                if (iterations == 0) {
216                    response.getHeader().setFlag(Flags.AA);
217                }
218            }
219        } else if (sr.isDelegation()) {
220            RRset nsRecords = sr.getNS();
221            addRRset(nsRecords.getName(), response, nsRecords, Section.AUTHORITY, flags);
222        } else if (sr.isCNAME()) {
223            CNAMERecord cname = sr.getCNAME();
224            RRset rrset = new RRset(cname);
225            addRRset(name, response, rrset, Section.ANSWER, flags);
226            if (zone != null && iterations == 0) {
227                response.getHeader().setFlag(Flags.AA);
228            }
229            rcode = addAnswer(response, cname.getTarget(), type, dClass, iterations + 1, flags);
230        } else if (sr.isDNAME()) {
231            DNAMERecord dname = sr.getDNAME();
232            RRset rrset = new RRset(dname);
233            addRRset(name, response, rrset, Section.ANSWER, flags);
234            Name newname;
235            try {
236                newname = name.fromDNAME(dname);
237            } catch (NameTooLongException e) {
238                return Rcode.YXDOMAIN;
239            }
240
241            CNAMERecord cname = new CNAMERecord(name, dClass, 0, newname);
242            RRset cnamerrset = new RRset(cname);
243            addRRset(name, response, cnamerrset, Section.ANSWER, flags);
244            if (zone != null && iterations == 0) {
245                response.getHeader().setFlag(Flags.AA);
246            }
247            rcode = addAnswer(response, newname, type, dClass, iterations + 1, flags);
248        } else if (sr.isSuccessful()) {
249            List<RRset> rrsets = sr.answers();
250            for (RRset rrset : rrsets) {
251                addRRset(name, response, rrset, Section.ANSWER, flags);
252            }
253            if (zone != null) {
254                addNS(response, zone, flags);
255                if (iterations == 0) {
256                    response.getHeader().setFlag(Flags.AA);
257                }
258            } else {
259                addCacheNS(response, getCache(dClass), name);
260            }
261        }
262        return rcode;
263    }
264
265    public Zone findBestZone(Name name) {
266        Zone foundzone;
267        foundzone = znames.get(name);
268        if (foundzone != null) {
269            return foundzone;
270        }
271        int labels = name.labels();
272        for (int i = 1; i < labels; i++) {
273            Name tname = new Name(name, i);
274            foundzone = znames.get(tname);
275            if (foundzone != null) {
276                return foundzone;
277            }
278        }
279        return null;
280    }
281
282    public Cache getCache(int dclass) {
283        return caches.computeIfAbsent(dclass, Cache::new);
284    }
285
286    public RRset findExactMatch(Name name, int type, int dclass, boolean glue) {
287        Zone zone = findBestZone(name);
288        if (zone != null) {
289            return zone.findExactMatch(name, type);
290        } else {
291            List<RRset> rrsets;
292            Cache cache = getCache(dclass);
293            if (glue) {
294                rrsets = cache.findAnyRecords(name, type);
295            } else {
296                rrsets = cache.findRecords(name, type);
297            }
298            if (rrsets == null) {
299                return null;
300            } else {
301                return rrsets.get(0); /* not quite right */
302            }
303        }
304    }
305
306    void addRRset(Name name, Message response, RRset rrset, int section, int flags) {
307        for (int s = 1; s <= section; s++) {
308            if (response.findRRset(name, rrset.getType(), s)) {
309                return;
310            }
311        }
312        if ((flags & FLAG_SIGONLY) == 0) {
313            for (Record r : rrset.rrs()) {
314                if (r.getName().isWild() && !name.isWild()) {
315                    r = r.withName(name);
316                }
317                response.addRecord(r, section);
318            }
319        }
320        if ((flags & (FLAG_SIGONLY | FLAG_DNSSECOK)) != 0) {
321            for (Record r : rrset.sigs()) {
322                if (r.getName().isWild() && !name.isWild()) {
323                    r = r.withName(name);
324                }
325                response.addRecord(r, section);
326            }
327        }
328    }
329
330    private void addSOA(Message response, Zone zone) {
331        response.addRecord(zone.getSOA(), Section.AUTHORITY);
332    }
333
334    private void addNS(Message response, Zone zone, int flags) {
335        RRset nsRecords = zone.getNS();
336        addRRset(nsRecords.getName(), response, nsRecords, Section.AUTHORITY, flags);
337    }
338
339    private void addCacheNS(Message response, Cache cache, Name name) {
340        SetResponse sr = cache.lookupRecords(name, Type.NS, Credibility.HINT);
341        if (!sr.isDelegation()) {
342            return;
343        }
344        RRset nsRecords = sr.getNS();
345        for (Record r : nsRecords.rrs()) {
346            response.addRecord(r, Section.AUTHORITY);
347        }
348    }
349
350    private void addGlue(Message response, Name name, int flags) {
351        RRset a = findExactMatch(name, Type.A, DClass.IN, true);
352        if (a == null) {
353            return;
354        }
355        addRRset(name, response, a, Section.ADDITIONAL, flags);
356    }
357
358    private void addAdditional2(Message response, int section, int flags) {
359        for (Record r : response.getSection(section)) {
360            Name glueName = r.getAdditionalName();
361            if (glueName != null) {
362                addGlue(response, glueName, flags);
363            }
364        }
365    }
366
367    private void addAdditional(Message response, int flags) {
368        addAdditional2(response, Section.ANSWER, flags);
369        addAdditional2(response, Section.AUTHORITY, flags);
370    }
371
372    private int addAnswerOld(Message response, Name name, int type, int dClass, int iterations, int flags) {
373        // TODO This needs to be more like jnamed
374        // Add answers as needed
375        switch (type) {
376            case Type.A: {
377                return configuration.getJson("dns.hosts." + name.toString(true)).map(result ->
378                {
379                    if (result.isTextual()) {
380                        try {
381                            response.addRecord(fromString(name, Type.A, DClass.IN, 86400, result.textValue(), Name.root), Section.ANSWER);
382                        } catch (IOException e) {
383                            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
384                        }
385                    } else if (result instanceof ArrayNode array) {
386                        for (JsonNode jsonNode : array) {
387                            try {
388                                response.addRecord(fromString(name, Type.A, DClass.IN, 86400, jsonNode.textValue(), Name.root), Section.ANSWER);
389                            } catch (IOException e) {
390                                throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
391                            }
392                        }
393                    }
394                    return Rcode.NOERROR;
395                }).orElse(Rcode.NXDOMAIN);
396            }
397
398            case Type.SRV: {
399                return configuration.getJson("dns.hosts." + name.toString(true)).map(result ->
400                {
401                    if (result.isTextual()) {
402                        try {
403                            response.addRecord(toSrvRecord(name, 60, 1, 1, result.textValue()), Section.ANSWER);
404                        } catch (IOException e) {
405                            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
406                        }
407                    } else if (result instanceof ArrayNode array) {
408                        for (JsonNode jsonNode : array) {
409                            try {
410                                response.addRecord(toSrvRecord(name, 60, 1, 1, jsonNode.textValue()), Section.ANSWER);
411                            } catch (IOException e) {
412                                throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
413                            }
414                        }
415                    }
416                    return Rcode.NOERROR;
417                }).orElse(Rcode.NXDOMAIN);
418            }
419
420            default: {
421            }
422        }
423        return Rcode.NXDOMAIN;
424    }
425
426    private void errorMessage(Header header, Message response, int rcode, Record question) {
427        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
428            response.removeAllRecords(i);
429        }
430//        if (rcode == Rcode.SERVFAIL) {
431        response.addRecord(question, Section.QUESTION);
432//        }
433        header.setRcode(rcode);
434    }
435
436    private SRVRecord toSrvRecord(Name name, int ttl, int priority, int weight, String target) throws TextParseException {
437        String[] hostPort = target.split(":");
438        String host = hostPort[0] + ".";
439        int port = hostPort.length == 2 ? Integer.parseInt(hostPort[1]) : -1;
440        return new SRVRecord(name, Type.SRV, ttl, priority, weight, port, Name.fromString(host));
441    }
442
